QuestData.Title: The Wranglers
QuestData.Description:
Great evil exists on Argus and our forests house some of the worst of it. My wranglers are at the edge of the forest and are waiting for reinforcements. That would be you.
Seek out Lead Rider Jerek, he will tell you more.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Lead Rider Jerek in the Petrified Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: I fear the forest may be lost.
